task.title: Configuring release 16 support for the AMF LI and the HTTP2 on the X1_1 links
task.shortdesc: The release 16 support for the AMF Lawful interception and the HTTP2 on the X1_1 links can be configured with liconf amfAdmf command.

context.p: The format of the matched target identifier sent on the X2 IRI events to the MDF2 is changed when value rel16asnv1 is used. Check the format that the MDF2 supports before changing the value.
The HTTP2 is only supported with the AMF LI configuration, but not with the IEF functionality.

step.cmd: Specify the ADMF to release 16 ASN.1 for the release 16 AMF LI.

stepxmp.codeblock: liconf amfAdmf modify --poiAct false --admfIndex <index> liconf amfAdmf modify --asn1Version rel16asnv1 --admfIndex <index> liconf amfAdmf modify --poiAct true --admfIndex <index>

step.cmd: Enable the HTTP2 support on the X1_1 interface.

stepxmp.codeblock: liconf amfAdmf modify --poiAct false --admfIndex <index> liconf amfAdmf modify -- x1ProfileSelection HTTP2--admfIndex <index> liconf amfAdmf modify --poiAct true --admfIndex <index>
